trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, represents a data store for writing and reading user annotations.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中被覆寫時，表示用來寫入和讀取使用者註解的資料存放區。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The annotation to add to the store.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至存放區的註解。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> to the store.
trans-unit.target: 將新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> 加入存放區中。

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> is added to the store its globally unique identifier (GUID) <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property is set to a new value.
trans-unit.target: 當新<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>加入存放區中的全域唯一識別碼 (GUID)<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>屬性設定為新值。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AddAnnotation%2A> is called, its <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property is checked to see if the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> already has been added to the store.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AddAnnotation%2A>呼叫時，其<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>會檢查屬性是否<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>已經加入存放區。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> already has been added and exists in the store (as determined by its <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property) an <xref:System.ArgumentException> error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>已經加入，而且存在存放區中 (由其<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>屬性)<xref:System.ArgumentException>會擲回錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="newAnnotation" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newAnnotation" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> with the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> property value already exists in the store.
trans-unit.target: 存放區中已經存在具有相同 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> 屬性值的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: 已在存放區中呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an anchor on any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於存放區中任何 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> 上的錨點變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged> event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged>事件可用來監視變更註解<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>包含在存放區，而不需要在每個註冊<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>個別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an author on any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於存放區中任何 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> 上的作者變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged> event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged>事件可用來監視變更註解<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A>包含在存放區，而不需要在每個註冊<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>個別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要將註解緩衝區中的資料立即寫入實體資料存放區。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store for each operation; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> if data in the annotation buffers is to be written when the application explicitly calls <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要針對每項作業，將註解緩衝區中的資料立即寫入實體資料存放區，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果要在應用程式明確呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush" /> 時，才將註解緩衝區中的資料寫入，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an explicit-save model can set <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `false` and call <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> directly when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 使用明確儲存模型的應用程式可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>至`false`呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>直接適當的時候。

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an implicit-save model can set <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `true` to cause <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).
trans-unit.target: 使用隱含儲存模型的應用程式可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>至`true`造成<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>自動呼叫每個存放區作業之後 （新增、 刪除或修改）。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cargo on any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於存放區中任何 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> 上的貨物變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged> event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged>事件可用來監視變更註解<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A>包含在存放區，而不需要在每個註冊<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>個別。

trans-unit.source: The GUID <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> property of the annotation to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 所要刪除註解的 GUID <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the annotation with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> from the store.
trans-unit.target: 將含有指定之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> 的註解從存放區中刪除。

trans-unit.source: The annotation that was deleted; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if an annotation with the specified <paramref name="annotationId" /> was not found in the store.
trans-unit.target: 已刪除的註解；如果在存放區中找不到含有指定之 <paramref name="annotationId" /> 的註解，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.DeleteAnnotation%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範搭配<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.DeleteAnnotation%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: 已在存放區中呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases resources used by the store.
trans-unit.target: 釋放存放區所使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the store.
trans-unit.target: 釋放存放區使用的所有 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Applications should call <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> when finished with the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式應該呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>完成<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> the application can release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> to allow the garbage collector to reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>應用程式可以釋放所有參考<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>允許記憶體回收行程回收的記憶體，<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>所佔用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> method calls the protected <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>`(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter of `true` to release all managed and unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 公用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>方法會呼叫受保護<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>`(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數`true`釋放所有的 managed 和 unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> before the last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> is released.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>之前的最後一個參考<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>釋放。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> is not called, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> resources will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the store's <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>不呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>資源將不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫存放區的<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the store and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放存放區所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並可選擇釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This protected <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> method is called by the public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 保護這<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>方法稱為由公用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>`(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 公用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>叫用受保護<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>`(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> releases all resources held by any managed objects that the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數是`true`，<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>釋放所有資源都保留的任何 managed 物件<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>參考。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> also invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> 也會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="" /><see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /><see langword="(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="" /> <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> <see langword="(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Guarantees that <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> will eventually be called for this store.
trans-unit.target: 確保終究會為這個存放區呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides base <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫基底<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The application program should not call <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> directly.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式不應該呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A>直接。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> is automatically invoked during garbage collection unless disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> 會自動叫用記憶體回收期間停用呼叫<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Finalize 方法和解構函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Forces any annotation data retained in internal buffers to be written to the underlying storage device.
trans-unit.target: 強制將保留在內部緩衝區中的任何註解資料，寫入基礎儲存裝置。

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an explicit-save model can set <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `false` and call <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> directly when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 使用明確儲存模型的應用程式可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>至`false`呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>直接適當的時候。

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an implicit-save model can set the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `true` to cause <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).
trans-unit.target: 使用隱含儲存模型的應用程式可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>至`true`造成<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>自動呼叫每個存放區作業之後 （新增、 刪除或修改）。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> method when the application closes the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>方法的應用程式關閉時<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.DeleteAnnotation%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範搭配<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.DeleteAnnotation%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: 已在存放區中呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: The GUID <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> property of the annotation to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 所要傳回註釋的 GUID <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the annotation with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> from the store.
trans-unit.target: 從存放區傳回含有指定之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id" /> 的註解。

trans-unit.source: The annotation with the given <paramref name="annotationId" />; or <see langword="null" />, if an annotation with the specified <paramref name="annotationId" /> was not found in the store.
trans-unit.target: 含有指定之 <paramref name="annotationId" /> 的註解；如果在存放區中找不到含有指定之 <see langword="null" /> 的註解，則為 <paramref name="annotationId" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: 已在存放區中呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of annotations contained in the store.
trans-unit.target: 傳回存放區中包含的註解清單。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.GetAnnotations%2A> method to determine if there are any annotations contained in the store.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.GetAnnotations%2A>方法，以判斷是否有任何存放區中所包含的附註。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all the annotations in the store.
trans-unit.target: 傳回存放區中的所有註解清單。

trans-unit.source: The list of all annotations currently contained in the store.
trans-unit.target: 目前包含在存放區中的所有註解清單。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.GetAnnotations%2A> method to determine if there are any annotations contained in the store.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.GetAnnotations%2A>方法，以判斷是否有任何存放區中所包含的附註。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: 已在存放區中呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart" /> sequence to return matching annotations for.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回其相符註解的起始 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart" /> 順序。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of annotations that have <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors" /> with locators that begin with a matching <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart" /> sequence.
trans-unit.target: 傳回註解清單，這些註解擁有的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors" /> 具有從相符 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart" /> 順序起始的定位器。

trans-unit.source: The list of annotations that have <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors" /> with locators that start and match the given <paramref name="anchorLocator" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if no matching annotations were found.
trans-unit.target: 註解清單，這些註解擁有的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors" /> 具有啟動和符合指定之 <paramref name="anchorLocator" /> 的定位器；如果找不到符合的註解，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.GetAnnotations%2A> method internally uses the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> class to search and match for the annotations to return.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.GetAnnotations%2A>方法在內部使用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>以搜尋並符合傳回的註解的類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> has been called.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已經呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" /> has been called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose" />，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AuthorChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AuthorChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> is added to or deleted from the store.
trans-unit.target: 發生於在存放區中加入或刪除 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation" /> 時。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add an event delegate for the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何將加入的事件委派<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows operation of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged> event delegate.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範的作業<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged>事件委派。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object to use as a synchronization lock for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> critical sections.
trans-unit.target: 取得要做為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> 關鍵區段之同步鎖定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to use as a synchronization lock for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> critical sections.
trans-unit.target: 要做為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> 關鍵區段之同步鎖定的物件。
